                      throws java.sql.SQLException

        Returns:

                               int customerID)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        this method is implemented for creating a shopping cart for user
        Parameters:
        sessionID - the generated session ID for this cart
        customerID - the cart's customer
        Returns:
        IShoppingCart object representing the created cart
